definition: main hall of a Buddhist temple
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

pinyin: Sheng4 Bo2 duo1 lu4 Da4 dian4

sentences.english: Daniel, beneath that Buddha statue is the Dazangwang Hall.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，那佛像的下面就是地藏王大殿了。

sentences.english: The hall was first built in 1406 and later repaired many times.
sentences.chinese: 这个大殿始建于1406年随后曾多次维修。

sentences.english: We simply used a mosquito net in the meditation hall.
sentences.chinese: 在打坐大殿里，我们只用一顶蚊帐。

sentences.english: Suspended Peak, five stamping on the Dougong, Liangjia Basilica structure and a slightly different approach.
sentences.chinese: 悬山顶，五踩斗拱，梁架结构与大殿做法略有不同。

sentences.english: Renshoudian name Qinzheng Palace, the emperor sitting in the hall behind.
sentences.chinese: 仁寿殿原名勤政殿，是皇帝坐朝听政的大殿。

sentences.english: Is it necessary to rise at four in the main hall style of singing Evensong?
sentences.chinese: 是否一定要四点起床，在大殿唱念课诵？

sentences.english: Monument up to two meters, matched with the main hall under the copper top, magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 两碑高达五米，与大殿铜顶上下相映，宏伟壮观。

sentences.english: The three halls of the Inner Court are slightly smaller scale versions of the three halls in the Outer Court.
sentences.chinese: 内朝的三殿要比外朝的三大殿在规模上稍小一些。

sentences.english: Yuan temple's main hall Yellow Emperor placed among the memorial tablets.
sentences.chinese: 轩辕庙内的大殿中间放有黄帝的牌位。

sentences.english: Old white, four people just outside the door in the hall, see ren ying ying.
sentences.chinese: 老白等四人就在门外进到了大殿内，看到任盈盈。

sentences.english: In the center of the main cultivation hall, there are three statues, one Buddha and two Bodhisattvas.
sentences.chinese: 大殿当中供的佛像一定是三尊，一尊佛两尊菩萨。

sentences.english: Blue phoenix in the hall inside support make fox blunt, and said hed take handsome than the sword.
sentences.chinese: 蓝凤凰在大殿内拥护里了令狐冲，并说要比剑夺帅。

sentences.english: The solemn door of Chong-Sheng Palace opens slowly.
sentences.chinese: 崇圣大殿庄严的大门缓缓地打开。

sentences.english: East hall large amount of column arch eye on the pieces of wall paintings, are also relics of the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 东大殿内柱额上的几幅拱眼壁画，亦为唐代遗物。

sentences.english: The Outer Court consists of large structures and enormous spaces.
sentences.chinese: 外朝由三个宏伟的大殿和巨大的空间组成。

sentences.english: Both the garden and hall are government-designated important cultural assets.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，该花园和大殿都是政府指定的重要文化遗产。

definition: main hall of a Buddhist temple
(literary) halls (of a palace or a temple)
Hall of Great Strength, main hall of a Buddhist temple containing the main image of veneration 大雄[da4 xiong2]
underground palace (as part of imperial tomb)
a room for keeping sth hidden/secret room/hidden chamber
Gaotai county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu
Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
